column4: Glick: The amd64 chip currently works by being natively 64 bit, but emulating 32 bit commands. This is why there is a slight performance hit with 32 bit apps and oses
What IS mythTV, anyway? Everyone seems to be making a fuss over it
its a program that emulates a set-top-box tv for linux
During the install of the flash plugin, it says it needs two particular font packages or it won't work quite right. Have ya' made sure you have those?
